string.value: I heard that #p2050001# of #m221000000# has something new to research, and is in need of help...

As someone who tirelessly studied life in space, #p2050001# wondered if a monster from Eos Tower, #b#o3230302##k, is in fact an alien. He said details could be found out by having an octopus key chain......

#i4000099##t4000099# #b#c4000099#/1#k

Then... if there's a more definite evidence than #t4000099#, maybe we'll find out a more accurate answer.
Gave #p2050001# #t4000099#. Will #p2050001# be able to find the correlations betwee #o3230302# and aliens?

Hmmm... wait, this is...!! Wow... interesting... it's definitely worth studying. Hey, you look like a traveler... have you ever been to Eos Tower? If so, then you may have met a monster that resembles an Octopus, #o3230302#. A monster called #b#o3230302##k, isn't it strange?

What do I mean by this? Well, the way #o3230302# is structured, it really looks familiar...and after some researching, I have come to conclusion that it may be close to that of the aliens. Maybe #o3230302# is made by the aliens. It's defeintely worth more attention. Can you help me on this?

The physical structure of the aliens are well-known in Omega Sector, so I know a thing or two about, but they can't be necessarily called #o3230302#. That's why I want you to go get #b1 #t4000099##k, which is based on #o3230302#. Once you get that, we can determine the similarities between the Blocktopus and the Omega Sector aliens.
But you know... there's gotta be a better method to research something like #t4000099#. Something like a #bManual#k... but it's really hard to get, so just disregard what I just said.
So you can't help? I seriously hope you change your mind, for the sake of the humans on Earth. The Omega Sector aliens pose a grave threat.
You are still having trouble acquiring the octopus keychain. They are owned by Blocktopuses.
